Text:
Thanks for a brilliant video

It's almost professional!

Have downloaded twice and the .iso image is not recognized by no software. Something is wrong here. Especially the person who says that the video is excellent. Can anybody else comment, please? I dislike people pulling my leg in these matters. I thank all the serious uploaders. The pranksters can go to hell.
Downloaded twice this concert. The .iso file does not open.
miroflax, i downloaded this yesterday especially for you :-) burned it with imgburn and played it just fine. the .iso file is ok, the content is barely acceptable... good only if you're a big fan.

I wrote in the nfo-file:

Details: Wild Zooming and a shaky cam =)
Audio: Rather good!
